rows.label: xs05120100_MSG0002
rows.name:
The Ganglion need your help.
But if you run again, we will break your legs.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05120100_MSG0004
rows.name:
You're asking for help with your guns
pointed at our heads? Seriously?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05120100_MSG0006
rows.name: It is a command: Like it or not—you WILL help us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05120100_MSG0007
rows.name: Y-you have such strange methods of persuasion...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05120100_MSG0009
rows.name: It worked on Prone. It will work on Ma-non.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05120100_MSG0010
rows.name: Too much talk. Captain. Time to kill.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05120100_MSG0011
rows.name: Hmm...yes. Kill one. Then the others will obey.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05120100_MSG0017
rows.name:
We saw you take care of those turrets, you know?
We owe you one, big time, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05120100_MSG0019
rows.name: Yes. Saves us the trouble of hunting them down![ST:wait ]
